section.title: Logging
section.para: As of Globus 4.2.0, GridFTP server provides system administration logs in 2 different formats. The CEDPS best practices compliant format is a new format provided by GridFTP server available in Globus version. For more details on the CEDPS Logging format, see http://cedps.net/index.php/LoggingBestPractices.

Netlogger-style logging
